title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Competencies: Language Education Design Using a Constructivist-Based Blended Learning Model

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can independently design language simulation tasks by applying the four stages (Translation-Chunking-Operation-Integration) of the TSOI blended learning model
Learners can collaboratively develop language learning scenarios based on constructivist principles in VR environments
Learners can optimize the cognitive flow (inductive→deductive) of blended learning designs by incorporating formative assessment feedback
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
